items.title: Ch9
items.content_html:
指令选择

找出实现一个给定的IR Tree的恰当机器指令序列。Mapping IR into abstract assembly code

  • Abstract assembly = assembly with infinite registers
    • Invent new temporaries for intermediate results
    • Map to actual registers later
      本质上是patten matching
